languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, прошу вас, охладите свой гнев! У судна объемный трюм — быть может, с ними можно наладить торговые отношения? Давайте хотя бы выясним, кто они такие, прежде чем обрушивать на них свою праведную ярость!"

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, прошу вас, охладите свой гнев! У судна объемный трюм — быть может, с ними можно наладить торговые отношения? Давайте хотя бы выясним, кто они такие, прежде чем обрушивать на них свою праведную ярость!"

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, прошу вас, охладите свой гнев! У судна объемный трюм — быть может, с ними можно наладить торговые отношения? Давайте хотя бы выясним, кто они такие, прежде чем обрушивать на них свою праведную ярость!"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please retrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please retrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, ne vous laissez pas dominer par la violence ! Les cales de ce vaisseau sont de taille non négligeable, ils accepteront peut-être de procéder à des échanges commerciaux ? Essayons au moins de savoir à qui nous avons à faire avant de leur faire subir votre courroux ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, ne vous laissez pas dominer par la violence ! Les cales de ce vaisseau sont de taille non négligeable, ils accepteront peut-être de procéder à des échanges commerciaux ? Essayons au moins de savoir à qui nous avons à faire avant de leur faire subir votre courroux ! »

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte zügelt Euren Zorn! Das Raumschiff hat einen großen Frachtraum. Vielleicht wären sie bereit, eine Handelsbeziehung einzugehen? Lasst uns zumindest herausfinden, wer sie sind, bevor Ihr sie mit Eurem rechtschaffenen Zorn auslöscht!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte zügelt Euren Zorn! Das Raumschiff hat einen großen Frachtraum. Vielleicht wären sie bereit, eine Handelsbeziehung einzugehen? Lasst uns zumindest herausfinden, wer sie sind, bevor Ihr sie mit Eurem rechtschaffenen Zorn auslöscht!"

languages.text: «¡Por favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}, conténgase! La bodega de esta nave del vacío es bastante amplia; es posible que estén dispuestos a comerciar. ¡Intentemos descubrir quiénes son antes de que desate toda su furia sobre ellos!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}, conténgase! La bodega de esta nave del vacío es bastante amplia; es posible que estén dispuestos a comerciar. ¡Intentemos descubrir quiénes son antes de que desate toda su furia sobre ellos!».

languages.text: “大人，请您息怒！这艘虚空舰的船舱相当宽敞，说不定他们愿意与您建立贸易关系？在您用正义的怒火痛击他们之前，至少让先弄清楚他们是什么人！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

traits.locale_text: “大人，请您息怒！这艘虚空舰的船舱相当宽敞，说不定他们愿意与您建立贸易关系？在您用正义的怒火痛击他们之前，至少让先弄清楚他们是什么人！”

languages.text: 「陛下、お怒りをお抑えください！ヴォイドシップは広大な船倉を有しています。あるいは通商関係を結ぶ意思があるかもしれません。義憤に駆られて彼らを打ちのめす前に、せめて正体を突き止めさせてください！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、お怒りをお抑えください！ヴォイドシップは広大な船倉を有しています。あるいは通商関係を結ぶ意思があるかもしれません。義憤に駆られて彼らを打ちのめす前に、せめて正体を突き止めさせてください！」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, lütfen öfkenize ket vurun! Uçsuz gemisinin ambarı çok geniştir. Belki de ticari bir ilişki kurma isteğindedirler? Haklı öfkenizle onları yok etmeden önce en azından kim olduklarını öğrenelim!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, please restrain your anger! The voidship has a spacious hold — perhaps they would be willing to establish trade relations? Let us at least find out who they are before you smite them with your righteous fury!"
